sentences.en: 'sally Foster, don't you know you would have to inquire around? "
sentences.cn: “ 萨利-福斯特, 你难道不知道你得四处打探 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: ‘Why are you doing that?’ the boy inquired.
Elsie called to inquire after my health.
sentences.cn: 埃尔茜打电话来问候我。

sentences.en: He went to the hospital to inquire about her.
sentences.cn: 他到医院去打听她的情况.

sentences.en: I must inquire after my sick friend.
sentences.cn: 我得去问候我那得了病的朋友.

sentences.en: I rang up to inquire about train times.
sentences.cn: 我打了电话查询列车时刻。

sentences.en: I will inquire when to begin our lessons.
sentences.cn: 我要去问一下我们什么时候开始上课.

sentences.en: Inspectors were appointed to inquire into the affairs of the company.
sentences.cn: 督查员受委派调查该公司的事务。

sentences.en: It would be well to inquire.
Methinks, gentlemen, we need inquire no further. "
sentences.cn: 依我看, 诸位先生, 我们无需再问了. ”

sentences.en: Physics does not inquire into the essence of atoms or of light.
sentences.cn: 物理学并不探求原子或光的本质.

sentences.en: She did manage to inquire at the box - office, however.
sentences.cn: 但是她最后还是走到售票处去打听.

sentences.en: The investigation will inquire into the company’s financial dealings.
sentences.cn: 此次调查将会涉及公司的财务往来。

sentences.en: They determined to inquire thoroughly into the matter.
sentences.cn: 他们决定彻底调查这件事.

sentences.en: Toby would have liked to inquire further (= ask more questions ).
sentences.cn: 托比本想问更多的问题。

sentences.en: We must inquire into the matter.
Why don't you inquire by telephone?
sentences.cn: 你何不打电话去问一问?

sentences.en: You can inquire of your new neighbors where the post office is.
sentences.cn: 你可以问问你的新邻居邮局在哪儿.

words.tran_cn: 询问的；打听的；爱追究的

trans.tran_cn: 打听， 询问； 调查， 查问
